articles.description: The returning rock star reflects on underground sounds, happy times, and his lockdown locks.
articles.content:
Image copyrightNicole Nodland Image caption
 Paul Weller has returned to Polydor - the record label who once rejected his work
As the owner of one of the most famous haircuts in the country for the… [+6680 chars]

articles.title: Mulan Delayed Again by Disney - Den of Geek UK
articles.description: Like Warner Bros. with Tenet, Disney has delayed Mulan until August.
articles.content: Things will surely be better in August, right? Thats at least what Disney is hoping as the studio quietly announced late Friday evening that the forthcoming live-action remake of Mulan is moving for … [+1786 chars]
